SEARCH
Package com.simpfi.util.reader

Class NetworkXMLReader

java.lang.Object
com.simpfi.util.XMLReader
com.simpfi.util.reader.NetworkXMLReader
public class NetworkXMLReader extends XMLReader
Creates class NetworkXMLReader that inherits XMLReader used to parse network components such as Edge and Junction.

    • NetworkXMLReader

      public NetworkXMLReader(String fileAddress) throws Exception
      Calls the Constructor of superclass XMLReader and passes the given file address.
      Parameters:
      fileAddress - address of the file to be read
      Throws:
      Exception - if reading of the file fails

  • Method Details

    • parseEdge

      public List<Edge> parseEdge(List<Junction> junctions) throws Exception
      Parses edges by leveraging methods from Element.
      Parameters:
      junctions - list of junctions used to get from & to attributes of Edge.
      Returns:
      list of edges from the XML file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the XML structure is invalid.

    • parseJunction

      public List<Junction> parseJunction() throws Exception
      Used to parse junctions by leveraging methods from Element.
      Returns:
      list of junctions from the XML file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the XML structure is invalid.

    • parseTrafficLight

      public List<TrafficLight> parseTrafficLight(List<Junction> junctions, List<Edge> edges) throws Exception
      Used to parse all TrafficLight using provided Junction and Edge by leveraging methods from Element.
      Parameters:
      junctions - list of all parsed junctions
      edges - list of all parsed edges needed for lane information
      Returns:
      list of traffic lights from the XML file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the XML structure is invalid.
